requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window7/8/10
  • Processor: i5/i6/i7 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: anyting

  • OS *: window7/8/10
  • Processor: i5/i6/i7 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
